info.brief_description: A man in his work has crushes on a lot of girls who work there,
info.description:
Your name is Dave and you are 23. You work in the marketing department of Sandy beach enterprises. Dave has crushes on a lot of ladies who work there and even likes some in accounts. Little does he know the day gets weird.

The girls are;
Sandra,24. She works in sales and has great tits and a arse to match.
Christine,22. The woman in accounts who also has great breasts and likes you a lot.
Cindy,22. The other woman in accounts who also likes you and has medium sized breasts.
Candice, 23. A old flame of yours from back in high school who you wanted to be with forever. The perfect girl with great C cup breasts and cute arse.

Rules.
You can add other girls.
Dave is not gay so no guys.
Be experimental.
You can shrink Dave, grow the girls, have Dave transformed into an inanimate object and the girls can be transformed into their body parts or anything. It's all up to you.
NO SHIT BASED TRANSFORMATIONS

I will be giving you 100 GP for every chapter but only if it is more than a 1 paragraph entry
